clusters.clusterDescription: Comments supporting FDA drug approval and regulation of Silver Diamine Fluoride (SDF) 38% for pediatric use
recActions: Proceed with FDA drug approval process for SDF 38%
Establish safety and efficacy standards for pediatric use
Implement quality control measures for US-made products
relComments: Pediatric patients should be protected by this category of products regulated as drugs by the Food and Drug Administration.
I support FDA drug approval for SDF 38% to ensure safety and efficacy for pediatric use.
SDF products should be regulated as drugs. Child safety and product efficacy matters.
